website_summaries.verdict: Lower price per ounce versus other organic cacao powder choices.
pros: Works well in many different types of recipes with a desirable consistency
Certified as organic, non-GMO, and gluten-free
Provides a nice boost of energy when mixed in with foods like smoothies
Has a high level of antioxidants
cons: Sometimes has an odd flavor versus some other cacao powders

customer_reviews.title: Contains a know Carcinogen
customer_reviews.text: There is a cadmium warning on this product. Cadmium is a known carcinogen. Look it up. This was conveniently left out of the long list of miraculous health benefits touted on the website. Deceptive and shameful. In the trash it goes.
customer_reviews.author: anatru2021

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great. I'm a bit wary of the warning on ...
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. I'm a bit wary of the warning on the bag about cadmium content. How much cadmium is in this stuff, and what is considered a safe level for daily consumption? Hmmm, I shall need to investigate further prior to reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Jami Lee

customer_reviews.title: Organic Cacoa Powder with Chemicals Including Cadmium
customer_reviews.text: This product does sport a Warning For California residents: Consuming this product CAN expose you to CHEMICALS including cadmium...which IS KNOWN to the state of California to cause Cancer, birth defects and reproductive harm. Don’t be fooled, this does not only occur in California, the laws alerting consumers are just more stringent in this state. Ingesting chemicals including cadmium in any location in the world can affect your health in negative ways, so please don’t think the warning on this bag of ‘organic cacoa’ Is safe for consumption outside of California...it’s not!
customer_reviews.author: JusBe

customer_reviews.title: The ONE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have been trying lots of healthy additives via Amazon, but let me just cut to the chase on this one: it is the CRACK of the natural world! Not it a bad way, but I even put in my coffee. On it three days, and feel amazingly healthy and energized. Get it while it’s still legal (wink, wink)!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: My skin looks so good. Well pleased
customer_reviews.text: Wish that I knew about this years ago. My skin looks so good. Well pleased. This is my second order. Expiration date is not till fall next year.
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: Cacao Powder
customer_reviews.text: It gives a nice choc taste and I use less then it recommends as I am not a huge chocolate lover, it seems to enhance my energy when I use it in my smoothies. I love it when I get the craves for sweet and fix myself a black cherry smoothie and add the cacao, since I cant overdue on the black cherries either.Its been working for me, I even use in the spinach and kale ones. Try it you wont be disappointed. It only takes tablespoon or so to make the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hamel

customer_reviews.title: Baobab Energy!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This stuff is a game changer! Energy boost! Baobab!
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Oddly Sour
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I got a bad bag of this but mine is extremely sour - more sour than a lemon. I've had other non sweetened brands of cocoa powder before and have never encountered this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: From a true African
customer_reviews.text: I am posting this on behalf of my husband He grew up eating this powder in its "native" habitat - lol He is literally THRILLED to find this product. It has a very fine texture (very well ground), excellent flavor If you also have someone who misses "buyyuu" from "back home" - this is it. You can use it to make the traditional recipe with salt, sugar chili etc I am thrilled cause when people bring it back from overseas its always dyed with red dye so this is a win
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Trim Healthy Mama Plan
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this in smoothies on the Trim Healthy Mama plan, and we have all been pleasantly surprised on the taste. It is sweet! Works well in smoothies and yogurt. The health benefits of baobab is what drew me in, and I can’t wait to try this in baking, too.
customer_reviews.author: GusMama

customer_reviews.title: Contains Lead
customer_reviews.text: I find it very deceiptful that the seller does not show the warning label or disclose information about this. I think potential exposure to a harmful chemical that causes cancer, birth defects, reproductive harm, and destruction of brain cells should not be concealed in a healthfood product. Unfortunately, I didn't notice this until a few weeks into using this product. I just noticed that another product of their's has cadmium. I will not be purchasing products from this company in the future. I want to be healthier, not ill. The stuff tastes pretty awful, too.
customer_reviews.author: im2bz

customer_reviews.title: Much better hot 🔥 🔥 🔥
customer_reviews.text: I first tried this as a cold drink by following a recipe that I found online. It was very gritty and I did not enjoy it at all. However, not long after, I felt a cold coming on. I pulled this stuff back out and added it to boiling water and a bit of honey. To my surprise, it tasted very good. It has now become my go to elixir for anyone in my family as soon as they start feeling sick. It does the trick!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cameleon1223

customer_reviews.title: Contains Cadmium
customer_reviews.text: So it has a disclaimer that it contains Cadmium which is known in a State of California to cause cancer and birth defects (totally safe in other states though 😂) isn’t it ironic for an antioxidant? I guess USDA organic thinks Cadmium is a part of a natural diet.
customer_reviews.author: Khrystyna Arzu

customer_reviews.title: Organic Cocoa Powder
customer_reviews.text: If you're a fan of dark chocolate then you'll love this Organic Cocoa Powder. I put 1 heaping tablespoon in every cup of coffee and it tastes amazing. Plus, it's a great and easy way to get added nutrients/antioxidants. I only wish it came in a canister instead of a bag because I think it would be less messy but other than that it's great. I am on auto-ship to always have it stocked and ready to use. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: pjkitty12189

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, but not suberb
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, not the best I've ever tried. Normally I buy a different brand of cacao but ran out of it and decided to give this one a try. First of all, I messed up and didn't notice it's organic but not raw. My bad. Second, the flavor is okay, but not as rich as I hoped it would be. And finally, it leaves a solid amount of sediment or sludge or whatever you call in at the bottom of the cup. I know it's normal, but in case of this brand it's more than I'm used to and doesn't taste good in my opinion. Kind of lumpy. Anyway, I'll finish the bag and probably won't experiment anymore)
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: Great taste. Fan of Cacao & Organic & Healthy items - Just noticed a warning label on package - that worries me. Otherwise the taste is great - helps satisfy the chocolate cravings - using it in smoothies, bullet coffee, chia pudding, baking, beverages,,,
customer_reviews.author: Denise S.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes disgusting
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people have said this item has a nutty flavor. Yeah, maybe if those nuts are of the human variety and went to the gym for five hours. Will definitely be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jessalyn Kattke

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find ethical cocoa.
customer_reviews.text: When you read that a good percentage of cocoa products are farmed by slave labor, it is off-putting. It is good to find something not tainted. it is also cacao, which is less processed and thus has more of the good stuff in it. I use it in baking and with milk to make a hot drink. I don't see a difference in flavor from the more processed cocoa. I suggest putting a little boiling water in the cup and then mixing in the cocoa powder, then adding the milk. This makes the cacao easier to blend. I then put the mug in the microwave to heat the milk.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite unsweetened cocoa powder!
customer_reviews.text: Whatever you use this product in-baking, or adding to hot cocoa mix, or your favorite coffee, I recommend this product. I first bought this item at Costco. I add it to my Cafe D'Vita Cappuccino Mocha Mix. It gives it a more creamy, smooth flavor. Plus, when I measure out my coffee per cup, I substitute a small portion (2 teaspoons worth at least!) of the coffee with the cocoa powder. I haven't had the opportunity to do any baking with this product yet. But, I'm betting brownies and cakes will taste much better using this particular cocoa powder!
customer_reviews.author: KCurley

customer_reviews.title: I wish the taste was better
customer_reviews.text: I feel a noticeable improvement in my libido, after a couple of weeks of use, but it is a struggle to get past its awful taste and odor. Also, it is a royal pain to stir it into anything - it loves to clump up into tiny balls of raw powder.
customer_reviews.author: Half

customer_reviews.title: Educate yourself on Cadmium consumption
customer_reviews.text: Changed from more expensive brand. Same ingredients and quality. Very happy with the product! Updated from 5 stars to 3 stars on 9/8/2020 due to Cadmium issue. I should have read other reviews more closer. I have found that cocoa contains Cadmium due to soil. This company put warning to their product. Not all brand, includes well known one, indicates their cocoa Cadmium warning. I am still learning Cadmium level in cocoa powder. I keep using this product from 3 times per week to less usage.
customer_reviews.author: Greenninjya

customer_reviews.title: Mixes best if used in blender
customer_reviews.text: I love this baobab powder. I have used multiple bags at this point. I typically add it to smoothies or use in a blended drink. A few times I have added and stirred or shaken it, it mixes okay but takes a while and still isn’t totally combined. Overall I recommed for the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: idigtexaspugs

customer_reviews.title: Contact seller
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to contact the seller before posting, but I could not find that option. I really enjoy this product but when I went to put it in my coffee this morning I found a chunk with a hair in it. No one in my household had hair that color and it was tightly packed in a hard chunk. I am so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: jenna sanders

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, consistent flavor
customer_reviews.text: I use a heaping teaspoon of this Organic Cacao powder added to the second cup of my coffee every morning. I've read that cacao is a good source of antioxidants, and since our health is the most valuable thing we have, it's worth using for that simple promise of increased health benefits. It's flavorless, in the sense that it's not like the store-bought chocolate bars one is used to. It really doesn't change the flavor of my coffee much since I drink it black anyway. Oh, I also add one or two tablespoons of organic EVOO to the same cup of coffee. Hard to say any more about such a "mundane" product. But the quality and consistency seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Used in my smoothie!
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive product. Using it based on reviews about baobab. Not sure if it does a lot but use it in my greens smoothie for fruit substitute. Did 4 leaves of red kale, a pear the baobab and stevia /honey sweetener. Definitely tastier than normal. It was fortitude to cut down my brush on our first light snow day here in PA.
customer_reviews.author: Dot Frank

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: The powder is sugar-free and only has 20 cals per tablespoon. I am concerning my blood sugar so I’ve been looking for something tastes good and healthy, this is it! I can enjoy my sugar free hot chocolate by only add milk with this powder! The packaging is not so good, hard to seal back once opened. But I still love the cocoa powder!!
customer_reviews.author: Zoie H

customer_reviews.title: CANCER WARNING ON THE LABEL
customer_reviews.text: On the back, it reads: "WARNING: Consuming this product can expose you to Cadmium, which is known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm." Hmmm, I'll pass.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Jane

customer_reviews.title: My favorite vitamin C powder
customer_reviews.text: This is much better tasting than acerola powder or other natural herbs with vitamin C. It just tastes light and citrusy. I add some to my water each morning with a little bit of stevia, lemon juice or ACV, and trace minerals or sea salt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liked
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for $8.49 same price as walmart typically but purchased from amazon because it is so convenient. This is my favorite cocoa powder. Light flavor, smooth consistency, gives energy. Great quality and value. Would buy this powder again and again. Good amount of nutrients compared to other cocoa powders and highest amount of vitamin c I've seen listed (many of then do not have full vitamin content). Use it in hot cocoa 1 tbls of powder with raw honey, homemade almond milk and pinch of Himalayan salt. Sometimes tiny bit of blackstrap molasses and cinnamon. Husband likes it in his coffee.
customer_reviews.author: mar

customer_reviews.title: not the best flavor, a bit chalky
customer_reviews.text: this is the best price I could find for maca, but I noticed that it won't mix with my protein powder as well. I don't mind it completely, but the flavor isn't as richly nutty as other brands either. a great option for a budget but not the highest quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Very rich
customer_reviews.text: I love adding this to a cup of coffee with stevia and almond/coconut milk - with a dash of salt and splash of vanilla. Decadent
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: This is such a wonderful find! The cacao powder is so very tasty ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a wonderful find! The cacao powder is so very tasty without any sugar or sweetener. I am putting it on my granola, on my cottage chesse, and yogurt. Nice delicate chocolate flavor with barely any calories! Satisfies my sweet tooth.
customer_reviews.author: nancyinabq

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value but omg the smell and taste is DISGUSTING. Not sure what this can be masked with but it’s definitely not in a smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: 4foryouglencoco

customer_reviews.title: Hormones changes for woman
customer_reviews.text: I have not been having any breast pain before menstrual cycle for years. I’m 30 years old Asian girl never been pregnant before. Ever since I’ve been taking this, I feel intense breast pain before period. I also gained a couple pounds without any diet change and exercise pattern. I’m sure this is good stuff but definitely messing with my hormones. For woman, Please take this with cautions.
customer_reviews.author: Billbillman

customer_reviews.title: Wow, chocolatey!
customer_reviews.text: My diet is about 99.5% organic (due to too many sensitivities) and I'm a relentless chocoholic. I've been paying $16 per pound for organic cocoa so to find this one is miraculous! Open the resealable bag and you're enveloped in the most incredible aroma. Yummy. It's dark and rich and makes my fat-free, vegan, fudgey brownies even better. Gooood stuff.
customer_reviews.author: DY

customer_reviews.title: Okay were good to go now
customer_reviews.text: Update I don't know what I was doing wrong but I have been blending it with no trouble lately. It has a very strong taste and it's a bit bitter for me but sweetened up with stevia it's pretty good. Going to keep getting it I like my guilt free chocolate fix. Just bought 2 more bags of it so you know I must like it.
customer_reviews.author: todd r young

customer_reviews.title: Good for nutrients
customer_reviews.text: Got this so I could add some more nutrients to my daily routine but I do not use that often because it promotes fertility - don’t want to get pregnant. But, when I do use it I enjoy it in smoothies and protein shakes. I’ve also put in oatmeal. It has a slight root taste but if our in liquid drinks, you can’t tel at all. Works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Georgina Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cacao powder blends ok, no clumping as of yet
customer_reviews.text: Never tried cacao powder for, so nothing to compare it to, except cocoa powder. But worked great, no clumping as of yet, in recipes. One thing that I dislike is that it's in a plastic bag that doesnt close completely because cacao powder gets in the ziplock groves. A container would've been more convenient, I transferred to a food-grade plastic container, for easier use.
customer_reviews.author: NickieAnn Tisue

customer_reviews.title: Great Cacao Taste!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely, rich cocoa powder that I first picked up when shopping at my local Costco warehouse. It was love at first taste. Since the pandemic, I haven't been able to buy it from Costco online so am glad it is available here. It is dark, smooth and mixes well with soy milk or, I would imagine with any dairy or non-dairy beverage.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Gerety Hays

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite boost supplement! It's a smaller bag then what you would find locally in store though.
customer_reviews.author: KymberliWeddle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make chocolate with some coconut oil and maple syrup. Added some almonds and vanilla, it was great. The whole place smells great now. It was a good price. Makes great chocolates. My only complaint is the bag which is somewhat awkward and messy to deal with. It would be easier to use if it was in a container.
customer_reviews.author: Heloise

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Product....Novice User....Rich Cacao
customer_reviews.text: As Advertised. Well made and pretty good with a smoothie. I actually add extra cocao as I love a slight bitter taste with my shakes. Try it with peanut butter or banana. Blends well. Good company, nice affordable product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING. I've compared to other cacao powders and this is the real thing. For the price, don't even think about it. Cacao has a truckload of antioxidants. This is great in smoothies, hot cocoa, pancakes, cookies, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Venkata

customer_reviews.title: No drugs--all superfoods and supplements
customer_reviews.text: I use this powder in my smoothies, and though I can't point to anything specific, I like that it is a superfood. What I do know is that I am never sick, have no aches or pains, and have never taken any drugs. And I am told that is highly unusual at my age. (that part's a secret). Be well. Avoid drugs.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Childs

customer_reviews.title: Not tasteless as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I add this powder to my daily smoothies and I've found that it dissolves nicely into liquids and isn't chalky or anything. The powder smells nice but oh boy, it is NOT flavorless. I can't exactly explain what the flavor is...it's somewhat nutty I guess, but it does overpower just about anything I put in my smoothies, including things like peanut butter and bananas. I started cutting the portion down to half to make up for it. Overall, it seems like a nice, clean, eco-friendly brand and I'm happy with the quality of the powder. I may be extra sensitive, but don't bank on it going unnoticed in your smoothies or oatmeals.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. I bought it to add to my water. It mixes well and tastes nice (I put a few drops of stevia for sweetness). Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: T&C

customer_reviews.title: Blends well in my protein shake
customer_reviews.text: I love chocolate and wanted to add quality flavor to the pure (tasteless) whey protein I use. This product is of very high quality with one ingredient: organic cacao powder. That's it, nothing else. I can add that to my shake or smoothie, with confidence. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Zap

customer_reviews.title: Great consistency in mixing without tasting it much
customer_reviews.text: This maca powder is amazing and mixes well. It has become a routine to add half a teaspoon in my açaí bowls every morning. The taste is hidden for the most part, however if you’re fishing for a flavor, it tastes like peanut butter. Reap its benefits without knowing its there
customer_reviews.author: Naureen

customer_reviews.title: Love it, bag not great tho
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal. Good quality, tastes great. Only "issue" was the bag doesn't close like it should, but I just use a chip clip! When it first arrived there was cacao all up in the opening part tho so it was also tricky to open without loosing a bunch of product.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Brooke

customer_reviews.title: yum!
customer_reviews.text: Love the citrus taste. I am a THM follower and love adding this to my water.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I actually felt better after adding this to my yogurt, coffee, mocha! We experimented and made little almond butter and peanut butter cups for Easter at home using pure maple syrup coconut oil and nut butters of our choice. Absolutely delicious worked fabulous. Will be purchasing this again!
customer_reviews.author: Deb McNulty

customer_reviews.title: yum
customer_reviews.text: I don't really know or care much about the ingredients in this but I use some in almost every smoothie I make and it tastes great. I'll use a few tablespoons in a chocolate, peanut butter and banana smoothie and its sooo good, but in fruit smoothies I'll just put 1 tablespoon so I can feel like I'm getting some protein and such and you can't really taste it then. I'm sure it would be perfect for hot chocolate too or baking.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: I recommend Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This increases your energy about 15-30min after taking it. Also it increases your libido for men and women; (attempting to use medical words so not to be reported) so men you will be more engorged and women more....”sexual discharge?”/wet. The energy is honestly amazing, use it well!
customer_reviews.author: Cedrick

customer_reviews.title: Yes just YES this stuff is amazing
customer_reviews.text: The taste is outstanding! Purchased because we’re trying to boost nutrition & cut out unhealthy sweets. But we’re chocolate lovers! Simple mousse: stir this into whipped cream (can sift into it for easier incorporating) and use a lot! Lol it’s delicious!! We subscribe to this. When it’s healthy AND even teens like it? Win/win!
customer_reviews.author: atexashousehold

customer_reviews.title: Real dark chocolate flavor
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't get better than this. I made a chocolate mousse dessert and it was so delicious. Usually, it takes a great deal of sugar to make dark chocolate taste good, but with less sugar and a bit of almond extract made my chocolate mousse a winner!
customer_reviews.author: GriselBel

customer_reviews.title: Never knew about cacao, but now I’m an addict.
customer_reviews.text: Somehow, cacao is more filling that instant chocolate. I drink it hot with milk and sweetener every night. The only drawback is that you have to keep stirring because the cacao does not dissolve like instant chocolate, but that’s a small inconvenience. It can be substituted for chocolate in baking as well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my panty
customer_reviews.text: This is something that I have in my pantry at any given time. I prefer baking with this product as it is organic and non GMO. We've used this for so many things from Hot cocoa, to brownies to Molé. It tastes wonderfully and this bag lasts us quite a while!
customer_reviews.author: jennys

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this in making any smoothies and dishes that would normally use Cocoa. Can't tell a difference in taste so I'm happy to use a product that is supposed to be more nutritious.
customer_reviews.author: Khawk

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't taste right...
customer_reviews.text: I first bought cacao by BetterBody Foods from Costco and we loved it. When we went to buy more, our Costco had stopped carrying it, so we purchased from Amazon. However somehow this cacao doesn't taste the same. It is not nearly as chocolatey. Not sure if we just got an iffy batch or what.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement full of antioxidants
customer_reviews.text: This is a super fine powder, which doesn't clump as much as other brands I've tried. Don't accidentally inhale it when you open the bag! I mix this in a stevia sweetened lemomade, and it is delicious. I feel it helps keep me well in cold and flu season.
customer_reviews.author: cgPA-C

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: This is surprisingly affordable, highly recommend this powder pack! When mixed with fruits in a smoothie, the powder doesn't have a distracting flavor.
customer_reviews.author: The Helpster

customer_reviews.title: So healthy and yummy
customer_reviews.text: I add this to my fruity smoothies and frosted lemonade drinks. It is fabulous for your health and delicious. I have to be careful with the textures Of the things I add it to because of the powder texture, but I love it and will continue to purchase it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Momma

customer_reviews.title: Not to bad I like it
customer_reviews.text: Very good in smoothies tried a little outside of the smoothie and it tastes pretty good. I liked it as an added benefit for my morning smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like vomit!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the maca powder from better body foods and received it in a timely manner with quality packaging which deserves the one star. The taste of the maca powder is absolutely disgusting! It tastes like vomit and smells just as horrific. DO NOT PURCHASE!!!! Walmart sells a better one for $4, I suggest that one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything is great. Except the taste.
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is great! I use this everyday added with a protein shake to avoid afternoon crash. So much better than coffee! Down side is the flavor. Out of the many brands I've tried this is the absolute worst. But it works! I'll be sticking with my usual maca powder brand.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stocks

customer_reviews.title: Yummy, smooth -never going back to cheap stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this, my chocolate baked goods have never been better! I was not so sure what to expect, but I am pleasantly surprised!! No bitterness, I can add more to make very dark chocolate, an not need to add so much sugar. So, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Carter7

customer_reviews.title: Can’t stand the smell or the flavor
customer_reviews.text: Love the benefits of the maca but the flavor and the smell just aren’t for me. Was so hard to swallow on anything I use it. If you had the same issue better buy maca pills instead
customer_reviews.author: DaniDan

customer_reviews.title: Keep your immune system healthy. Check out the benefits of Baobab online.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Dissolves easily in water or other liquids. I recommend stirring it into a small amount of liquid first and make a paste.
customer_reviews.author: Amy R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought Cacao Bliss for $65.00, but I returned it after buying this product. It is the same but at a sensible price. I mix it in my coffee and I made brownies with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Mausehund

customer_reviews.title: Good Cocoa Powder
customer_reviews.text: The powder itself it is good in favor and quality. A hint that this needs a little more water usage The one star taking out is the package. The plastic seal is hard to seal together.
customer_reviews.author: YL

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and super Nutritious!!
customer_reviews.text: this is legit good cacao powder. It has all the antioxidants and then some. There are other powders out there that don’t include all the nutrients like this one does. tastes delicious and one tablespoon a day is all you need. One bag lasts me a month.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cocoa powder
customer_reviews.text: I love this cocoa powder. It tastes amazing, it smells amazing, and the package is also very enticing. Price is also very competitive for an organic product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen A.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product. We use it in an immunity boosting lemonade drink that the whole family enjoys. The flavor is a nice lemony pineapple taste that is very pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed this product. Produces solid ones when using the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: This I'd a wonderful water soluble powder that adds value to any drink or sauce.
customer_reviews.author: Paula S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Yum!!
customer_reviews.text: SO yummy!!! I’ve been making these smoothie drinks with iced coffee, frozen bananas, cacao powder, and malt powder. This cacao powder is great!! Helps pull it all together! Yum!! Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: RETURN BUYER
customer_reviews.text: GOOD BUY for the price no denying; it is a bit generic in taste
customer_reviews.author: Simon Taxis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Good powder for shakes, doesn’t give as much flavor as I would like but still yummy. The resealable bag works better if you clean the seal part well. Over all pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany N

customer_reviews.title: African Super Fruit
customer_reviews.text: Interesting product , my package didn’t have a warning label on it . I don’t think I will get it again thou . I actually liked it in cold water to drink or in my juice or smoothies .
customer_reviews.author: Linda D

customer_reviews.title: Healthy version for kids hot cocoa and really tasty
customer_reviews.text: It’s the third time we buy this cacao brand. I meanly use it to make my daughter’s hot cocoa since that is how she likes her milk for breakfast. It’s super tasty, a little goes a long way. The only negative thing I would say is that it won’t dissolve easily. But I’m sure it’s because of it’s natural state. Overall we are very happy and will continue to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: William Demoraes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We use this cocoa powder for smoothies, pancakes, and chocolate milk. We appreciate it's quality, that it's without additives, and it's flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle T

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I put it in smoothies and make ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I put it in smoothies and make my own juice with lemon, water, ice, the baobab and a dash of stevia. So good!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P

customer_reviews.title: Great value and taste of CACAO!
customer_reviews.text: CACAO!!!! I love this stuff, I use it in my protein smoothies and it tastes great and dissolves perfectly. Great value for this quantity! Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: MSG

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I use everyday in my smoothie- very light flavor, but great.
customer_reviews.author: Maria McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Love this cacao
customer_reviews.text: Love this cacao. Use it all the time for baking and making anything chocolate. Amazon has the best price I've found for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rain Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Good flavor. Good price compared to other organic cacao. We keep a tablespoon from a set of measuring spoons down in the package, and it’s a little messy to use, but not a big drawback.
customer_reviews.author: Opinionated Karen

customer_reviews.title: Warning about cadmium on Better Body Foods - Organic Cacao Powder
customer_reviews.text: I guess it is my fault to have missed the warning statement about the exposure of cadmium. It seems that all cocoa powders will contain cadmium; I would not consume foods knowing of their risk. So, I have thrown this package away. Maybe the producer can test and label the level of cadmium
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It does take like citrus. The problem is is that it doesn't mix very well. You will still taste that powdery substance no matter how much you want
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and feeling good
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the flavor of the Baobab powder and take it daily. I have had less colds and illnesses than before.
customer_reviews.author: Ictgrand

customer_reviews.title: Bag doesn’t seal
customer_reviews.text: Bag doesn’t seal properly like it should so it’s not airtight. And it ended up making a mess in my pantry! Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: It's alright
customer_reviews.text: I tried making chocolate ice cream and overnight oats with this and they both ended up tasting a little grainy? Its like the cocoa doesn't really disolve all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Mobgob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Getting extra iron in any way I can. This is my second time buying this baobab stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous A

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: I love adding this to smoothies and using it for baking as well. Great health benefits and taste with very low calories.
customer_reviews.author: NLMickey0419

customer_reviews.title: First time purchaser of Cacao and love it
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great without any sweetener. Love adding it to variety of things such as plain greek yogurt or protein smoothies for flavor.
customer_reviews.author: LBG

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor, packaging is awkward to store in my cabinet. I also think this does not need to be this expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jacyncas

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and colorful
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this purchase. It came qucikly; it was fresh and delicious.i will definitely repurchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine but the packaging is awful. I cannot get the bag to reseal. Had to transfer to another container.
customer_reviews.author: Leftovers4Lunch

customer_reviews.title: great product. just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: great product, just as advertised and priced right. This is my second order and when finished I will order a third time
customer_reviews.author: steve B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, versatile cacao powder.
customer_reviews.text: Taste is exceptional, price incredibly reasonable, from smoothies to cereals to hot cocoa and beyond! Great for baking also. I will be buying this cacao powder again.
customer_reviews.author: Pecos Sam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this. We mix honey and cinnamon in it, taste like tamarind candy.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm73

product_meta.title: Organic Cacao Powder, Non-GMO, Gluten-Free Superfood (16 oz.)
product_meta.description: Flavor:CocoaFinding lean alternatives to common foods can be helpful for people who are trying to change their diet and live a better life. Instead of using ordinary cocoa powder, switch over to BetterBody Foods Organic Cacao Powder! With no additives, you’ll get the same great flavor as cocoa but without the guilt! Chocolate has never tasted so good! BetterBody Foods is a great addition to breakfast smoothies and shakes because it is a superfood that is loaded with helpful nutrients, vitamins, and antioxidants. Throw some of our powdered cacao in with protein powders that you are already using for an extra pop of chocolatey goodness. Our organic cacao powder is not only great in shakes and smoothies, but it can be used in a variety of baked goods. Use it in bread, cookies, muffins, cupcakes, pancakes, and waffles for a flavorful kick that your entire family will love! You can also use it to make hot chocolate beverages and classic Mexican mole sauce. The possibilities are endless! Unlike many other foods that have ingredients that you can’t even pronounce, our BetterBody Foods contains 1 simple ingredient: organic, cacao from Peru. With chocolate this pure, you'll never go back to ordinary cocoa. This natural cacao powder is the perfect new addition to your pantry. BetterBody Foods is determined to bring you quality foods that are better for your body without sacrificing the flavors that you enjoy. Find food that you'll love with our Organic Cacao Powder! Don't just take our word for it; try some for yourself today!
feature_bullets: LESS FAT & FEWER CALORIES: Chocolate is a staple in most households, but it can make people feel guilty because it is often associated with candy and sugary treats. Our Organic Cacao Powder provides you with a more nutritious alternative to regular chocolate. Our chocolate has the same great flavor as ordinary cocoa with the added benefits of organic cacao and less guilt.

BEST TASTING CACAO POWDER: Who doesn’t love indulging in a chocolate treat every once in a while? Our Organic Cacao Powder may seem like an unlikely contender when compared to the powdered cocoa you’re used to, but think again! It can be used as a substitute for ordinary chocolate powder in nearly any dish. It is the smart way to get your chocolate fix!

ORGANIC CHOCOLATE: Our Organic Cacao Powder (formerly LIVfit Superfood Organic Cacao Powder) can give you a boost of nutrients in each serving! This cacao powder is a great addition to any post-workout routine and can be used alongside the protein powder that you already use. This product comes in a 16 oz. bag and is USDA organic, non-GMO, and kosher certified. Oh, and it's also gluten-free!

SIMPLE INGREDIENTS: Nowadays, looking at food labels and nutrition facts can be confusing. To simplify your chocolate powder experience, we made Organic Cacao Powder with one simple all-natural ingredient: organic cacao from Peru. No more ingredients that you can’t pronounce. With our cacao powder, you know that you’re getting the real deal.

BLEND, BAKE, OR SHAKE: Kick cocoa to the curb and try cooking and baking with our Organic Cacao Powder. Mix into baked goods like bread, pancakes, waffles, cakes, and cookies to add a great chocolatey flavor. You can also blend it into breakfast smoothies and other tasty drinks. Great for men and women who are chocolate lovers. The possibilities are endless!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
